title: A Real rodeo. Fun fair. Felix out of luck. [compilation]
brief_description: A compilation of three short films. 1. A Real rodeo: Roping and typing a steer contest; horse and rider in bucking contest; steer bulldogging; queen of the rodeo. 2. Fun fair: Swing high - swing low; the gypsy’s warning; on the target; merry-go-round; steam-boat swing 3. Felix out of luck: animated cartoon.
